name: call-to-promise
description: Promiser is simple callback wrapper library. It generate, store and create a promise for any callback and pass arguments as expected.

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.umd.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.module.js --mode production
scripts.update-dependencies: CURRENT=$(git branch --show-current) && git stash && git checkout master && git pull && git checkout -b feature/dependencies-update && npx --yes npm-check-updates -u && npm i && npm run build && npm run test && git add package* && git commit -m 'Update dev dependencies' && git push --force origin feature/dependencies-update && goo master && git pull && git branch -D feature/dependencies-update && git checkout $CURRENT && CURRENT=0 && git stash pop

author: domino2
